hedline.hl1: Queens Man, Possibly Armed, Shot by Police
hedline.hl2: Queens Man, Possibly Armed, Shot by Police

block.p: Police officers shot and wounded a Queens man yesterday who had been threatening people with what appeared to be a handgun, but may have been a pellet gun, the police said.
The man, whose identity has not been released, was standing in front of his home in the Rosedale section about 9 p.m., waving what appeared to be a firearm, the police said.

It is unclear what happened once officers arrived, but the police shot the man. He was taken to Jamaica Hospital Medical Center, where he was in critical condition last night, the police said
An officer involved in the shooting was taken to the hospital with a shoulder injury, though the nature of the injury was not immediately clear, the police said.
